mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, b.state, b.skilled FROM errorwarehouse t ,point a,pointExerciseDetail b WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.pointId= a.id AND t.pointId=b.pointId AND t.userId=b.userId AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.isRight=0 AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND b.hidden=0 GROUP BY t.bookId,t.pointId ORDER BY b.skilled,a.sort,a.id,t.createTime ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.hidden=0
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND t.exerciseNumber=0 AND t.state=0 AND t.skilled=0 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber=0 AND t.state=0 AND t.hidden=0 AND t.skilled=0 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND t.state=2 AND t.hidden=0 AND t.skilled <= 1
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.hidden=0 AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND t.skilled <= 1 AND t.state=2 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.hidden=0 AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND t.skilled =4
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.lastExerciseDate ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.hidden=0 AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND t.skilled =4 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.lastExerciseDate ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.hidden=0 AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND t.state=3
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND t.state=3 AND t.hidden=0
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC
select t.id,t.pointId ,b.pointName ,t.cardData from card t ,point b where t.pointId=b.id and t.pointId=#{pointId} AND b.number>0

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.hidden=0 AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseNumber>0 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, b.state, b.skilled FROM errorwarehouse t ,point a,pointExerciseDetail b WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.pointId= a.id AND t.pointId=b.pointId AND t.userId=b.userId AND t.hidden=0 AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.isRight=0
AND t.bookId in
#{id}
GROUP BY t.bookId,t.pointId ORDER BY b.skilled,a.sort,a.id,t.createTime ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, b.state, b.skilled FROM point a,pointExerciseDetail b WHERE b.userId=#{userId} AND b.pointId= a.id AND b.bookId=a.bookId AND a.bookId=#{bookId} AND b.hidden=0
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
ORDER BY b.nextExerciseTime ASC
